actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to the tax-exempt interest on certain governmental obligations.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to apply the tax exclusion of interest on governmental securities only to those obligations issued by governments that do not impose any corporate tax whose base includes foreign source income.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to the tax-exempt interest on certain governmental obligations.
